channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Bruce Wu's Blog

item.title: Model Deployment (K8s and EKS)
item.description: In this article, I’ll explore how to deploy an existing Keras model to AWS-EKS using TensorFlow Serving and Kubernetes.

item.title: AutoKeras (AutoML)
item.description: Greater model parameters and network design are always preferred for better performance during model training.
